column4: llutz,i just upgraded my ubuntu 12.04, and it lost mouse support. can someone help me please? this passed on my Aspire one D270-268bb machine.
how did you upgrade? directly? or from release to release?
directly. with a usb key created
you likely broke your system then
you can't upgrade from 10.10 directly to 12.04, it isn't supported
it proposed it me at installation.
then it shouldn't have offered, it isn't supported
the only way to skip releases is from lts to lts
help me. hw can i remove and install it?
what's the fresh goal? hw can i use fresh?
